thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Trinity Industries Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.42

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Trinity Industries Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.42
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Trinity Industries Inc:
* TRINITY INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.15 TO $1.35 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.42 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.43 * Q4 REVENUE $906.4 MILLION VERSUS $1.1 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.00 TO $1.20 INCLUDING ITEMS
* SAYS NOW ANTICIPATES 2018 RAILCAR DELIVERIES OF 20,500, COMPARED TO DELIVERIES OF 18,395 RAILCARS IN 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
